section.title: Centralized Configuration
section.para: All Sparx applications use a single XML-based repository for all configuration items.

section.title: Value Sources
section.para:
A Value Source is the source of a single value, or a collection of values (a data object), for use in many places throughout Sparx. The format of a value source is similar to a URL (name:params). For example:
request:abc session-attr:abc form:abc
